articles.title: Giant SpaceX rocket leaves crater, serious damage at Texas base - HT Tech
articles.description: Repairing the damage from Thursday's unmanned test flight is expected to take months, potentially delaying further launch attempts and slowing the development of a rocket NASA plans to use on its upcoming Moon missions.
articles.content: Flying chunks of concrete, twisted metal sheets, craters blasted deep into the ground: the thunderous power of SpaceX's first test flight of Starship -- the biggest and most powerful rocket ever buil… [+4589 chars]

articles.title: China to test out 3D printing technology on moon to build habitats - Reuters
articles.description: China will explore using 3D printing technology to construct buildings on the moon, the official China Daily reported on Monday, as Beijing solidifies plans for long-term lunar habitation.
